Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: There's only so much GenAI can tell from a piece of work, while a teacher somewhat knows a student. They're also more knowledgeable in terms of the subject; sure GenAI can search up anything but it isn't the same.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I talk GenAI feedback more lightly compared to feedback from my teachers.
